speaker: LANCELET
text: Yes, truly, for look you, the sins of the father

speaker: LANCELET
text: are to be laid upon the children. Therefore I

speaker: LANCELET
text: promise you I fear you. I was always plain with you,

speaker: LANCELET
text: and so now I speak my agitation of the matter.

speaker: LANCELET
text: Therefore be o’ good cheer, for truly I think you

speaker: LANCELET
text: are damned. There is but one hope in it that can do

speaker: LANCELET
text: you any good, and that is but a kind of bastard hope

speaker: LANCELET
text: neither.

speaker: JESSICA
text: And what hope is that, I pray thee?

speaker: LANCELET
text: Marry, you may partly hope that your father

speaker: LANCELET
text: got you not, that you are not the Jew’s daughter.

speaker: JESSICA
text: That were a kind of bastard hope indeed; so

speaker: JESSICA
text: the sins of my mother should be visited upon me!

speaker: LANCELET
text: Truly, then, I fear you are damned both by

speaker: LANCELET
text: father and mother; thus when I shun Scylla your

speaker: LANCELET
text: father, I fall into Charybdis your mother. Well, you

speaker: LANCELET
text: are gone both ways.

speaker: JESSICA
text: I shall be saved by my husband. He hath made

speaker: JESSICA
text: me a Christian.

speaker: LANCELET
text: Truly the more to blame he! We were Christians

speaker: LANCELET
text: enow before, e’en as many as could well live

speaker: LANCELET
text: one by another. This making of Christians will

speaker: LANCELET
text: raise the price of hogs. If we grow all to be pork

speaker: LANCELET
text: eaters, we shall not shortly have a rasher on the

speaker: LANCELET
text: coals for money.

speaker: JESSICA
text: I’ll tell my husband, Lancelet, what you say.

speaker: JESSICA
text: Here he comes.

speaker: LORENZO
text: I shall grow jealous of you shortly, Lancelet,

speaker: LORENZO
text: if you thus get my wife into corners!

speaker: JESSICA
text: Nay, you need not fear us, Lorenzo. Lancelet

speaker: JESSICA
text: and I are out. He tells me flatly there’s no mercy for

speaker: JESSICA
text: me in heaven because I am a Jew’s daughter; and

speaker: JESSICA
text: he says you are no good member of the commonwealth,

speaker: JESSICA
text: for in converting Jews to Christians you

speaker: JESSICA
text: raise the price of pork.

speaker: LORENZO
text: I shall answer that better to the commonwealth

speaker: LORENZO
text: than you can the getting up of the Negro’s

speaker: LORENZO
text: belly! The Moor is with child by you, Lancelet.

speaker: LANCELET
text: It is much that the Moor should be more

speaker: LANCELET
text: than reason; but if she be less than an honest

speaker: LANCELET
text: woman, she is indeed more than I took her for.

speaker: LORENZO
text: How every fool can play upon the word! I

speaker: LORENZO
text: think the best grace of wit will shortly turn into

speaker: LORENZO
text: silence, and discourse grow commendable in none

speaker: LORENZO
text: only but parrots. Go in, sirrah, bid them prepare for

speaker: LORENZO
text: dinner.

speaker: LANCELET
text: That is done, sir. They have all stomachs.

speaker: LORENZO
text: Goodly Lord, what a wit-snapper are you!

speaker: LORENZO
text: Then bid them prepare dinner.

speaker: LANCELET
text: That is done too, sir, only “cover” is the

speaker: LANCELET
text: word.

speaker: LORENZO
text: Will you cover, then, sir?

speaker: LANCELET
text: Not so, sir, neither! I know my duty.

speaker: LORENZO
text: Yet more quarreling with occasion! Wilt

speaker: LORENZO
text: thou show the whole wealth of thy wit in an

speaker: LORENZO
text: instant? I pray thee understand a plain man in his

speaker: LORENZO
text: plain meaning: go to thy fellows, bid them cover the

speaker: LORENZO
text: table, serve in the meat, and we will come in to

speaker: LORENZO
text: dinner.

speaker: LANCELET
text: For the table, sir, it shall be served in; for

speaker: LANCELET
text: the meat, sir, it shall be covered; for your coming in

speaker: LANCELET
text: to dinner, sir, why, let it be as humors and conceits

speaker: LANCELET
text: shall govern.
